name: Cursed Skulls
description:
CURSED SKULLS

Small 2D platformer for my programmer portfolio where you play as a pirate marooned by his crew on an island full of dangers. Feel free to give me any feedback or ideas!!!
Assets from @PixelFrog.

CONTROLS

  • A W S D to move.
  • J to jump.
  • K to dash in any direction.
you can play with controller too :)
